attributes.action: Stop sending Aid to other countries that should be spent here in Britain
attributes.background: Millions being spent on wars and refugees ,while our own people are dying ,cancer drugs no longer being funded, food banks to feed thousands of low paid workers time to look after our own.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104655

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
